operatorClass.description: Operator id within a service (not globally unique). Uniqueness is determined by (serviceClass, operatorClass).

serviceClass.description: Reverse-DNS style id for the backend service this operator belongs to (e.g., svc.feel8.engine).

commands.description: Optional RPC-style commands the node can invoke (e.g., refresh/connect/disconnect)

editableCommands.description: Allow dynamic addition of commands beyond the declared list.

execInPorts.description: Execution inputs (can be empty for entry/pull-only nodes). Each execIn port may have only one incoming exec link.

execOutPorts.description: Execution outputs (can be empty for terminal/pull-only nodes). Operator logic decides which execOut to trigger.

editableDataInPorts.description: Allow dynamic addition of data input ports.

editableDataOutPorts.description: Allow dynamic addition of data output ports.

rendererClass.description: Optional custom UI renderer key for this operator node (e.g., realtimePlot, 3dViewer)

rendererProps.description: Optional renderer-specific configuration for the custom node UI
